website_summaries.verdict: Already gaining popularity as a top-notch skate shoe, the Adidas Adiease Premiere ADV comes with classic design elements along with skate-specific functionality. The sneaker is a combination of optimal performance and world-class style that is street-ready.For those who are looking for a sneaker that embodies the perfect balance of comfort, durability and style, this sneaker is worth considering.
pros: “Comfortable” was how the majority of the reviewers described the Adidas Adiease Premiere ADV
The majority was impressed with how good looking the shoe was
The sneaker had an excellent fit, being true to size, many happily observed
Many commented on the shoe’s great durability
Many wearers admired the sneaker’s good quality
The shoe performed well as a skate shoe, some users observed
Some were happy to report that the sneaker went well with shorts, jeans, and casual pants
The Adidas Adiease Premiere ADV offered good support, a few remarked
The sneaker came at a very good price for the quality it offered, some purchasers commented
The sole provides a good grip, one user observed
A couple was happy that the shoe did not require a break-in period, with one of them saying the shoe was comfortable to wear all day, fresh from its box
cons: Some were disappointed that the Adidas Adiease Premiere ADV felt a bit narrow
One wearer observed that the shoe had a snugger fit than previous Adidas Adiease versions
A reviewer did not like the stitching pattern, would have liked it if the front was plain
The sneaker was relatively heavy, one user observed

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly hefty shoes. Noticeable difference in weight just picking ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly hefty shoes. Noticeable difference in weight just picking them up between these and my previous pair of adidas that I disappointedly wore out in 3 months. Update:: I've now had these shoes about 9 months and they're still in great condition. I wear out shoes fast. I've put holes in 2 different pairs of shoes I bought after these (wearing these the most often) and honestly i'm impressed. 6 months is the longest a pair of shoes has ever lasted me before these. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T.P.

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and design but the size runs smaller. I used my old 9'5 samba as point of reference to get these pair of Majerus, a pair of Busenitz Vulc and a pair of Seeley. Althought the Majerus felt better than the Busenitz I still feel both pairs somehow smaller than the Samba and the Seeley. Good side of the story, I ended up giving the Busenitz to my nephew (he's 9') and he had no problem. I kept Majerus anyways
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: They look nice but you will regret buying these
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned plenty of skate shoes in my life and have never put something so uncomfortable on my feet. They’re the narrowest shoes ever. The back will rub the skin right off of your Achilles. My old combat boots were less stiff. Unfortunately, I threw them on first thing in the morning before work and am not sure if I can return them with dirt. They look nice but you will regret buying these. Spent a few extra bucks on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, exactly as shown. Fast delivery and made well, but run narrow. No big deal if your feet are narrow. My husband loves them and hopes to stretch them out over time. He has green adidas gazelles that are not narrow so we assumed they would be simikarThese run slim. But he didn’t want to return them.
customer_reviews.author: christina holthaus

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi Purpose Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I don’t see these anywhere among the S. Florida retailers where I buy my sporting goods and footwear. I am a 10.5 and they fit perfectly. These can be worn for fashion or any appropriate sports. I wear them for casual dress or for just bumming around. Very comfortable and the price is right. And they look great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice good looking shoes. The run a little tight for me but they are breaking in well. They are a little tighter than normal Adidas running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Varnado

customer_reviews.title: great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. I have wide feet so this one feels narrower but Im not wearing them for comfort. Definitely a fashion statement.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Adidas but a little tighter fit than my other Adidas????
customer_reviews.text: They seem tighter than my other Adidas shoes. It might be in my mind. I will still wear them. They are very good looking. I got some 5-6 small water spots on them but I hope I can clean them up.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Shoes feel great, look great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel great, look great, and fit great even though I typically don't like skinny shoes. Had good board feel out the box. I Did blow a hole in the side in about 2 days but that was brand new mob grip on brand new shoes. . I just reapply trick patches anyways and should have put them on right away. 5 stars cause I really like the way they skate. I like the less bulky feel they have.
customer_reviews.author: Sei 5

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: It has some stretching out to do, but my husband likes the shoes the more they stretch. Comfortable for running around work, while still keeping up with the dress code.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair of these exact shoes, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these exact shoes, and if I find a third I'll probably snatch those up too so that I don't have to be without them for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking. Make sure to put shoe goo on ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking. Make sure to put shoe goo on before doing any heel flips and stuff, but for ollies and stuff, no need for that.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit really good there are more comfortable than my 85$ vans and very good loking
customer_reviews.author: Helen Cormiea

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, just very stiff so my son doesn't wear them much.
customer_reviews.author: Crabby S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i wear the same size pumas and this was almost a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Jerome A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and they match the school's colors.
customer_reviews.author: KP Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Did not last!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fell apart faster than any other pair of adidas my family has ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: M. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Thx my son likes them, although he skates they last about as long as any other skate shoe but these were cool looking for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, hard to find this style where I live.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes love them
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes love them, wear them to school most days but they were about a size to big but i am okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them! Fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary N

customer_reviews.title: Dont fit as they say
customer_reviews.text: To tight in the front of the shoe, they look good but I think they run to small.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, but it runs so small I cant wear it, so I cant speak to comfort or wear. Review is for the shoes aesthetic alone.
customer_reviews.author: SuicidalLabRat

customer_reviews.title: super comfy
customer_reviews.text: they didnt really take much breaking in, comfy almost immediately after wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Crista Surentu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for by brother and he loves them. The navy and grey colorway looks great with many outfits. They seem very comfortable and fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He loves the shoes, very comfortable and fit as his normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

product_meta.title: Adidas Men's Adi-Ease Premiere Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: These adiease Premiere shoes have a clean, low-profile look and ready-for-anything toughness that makes them ideal for life on the board..
